mapper.insert: INSERT INTO camping_facilities(facility_name, category1, category2, category3, sido_name,sigungu_name,eupmyeondong_name, ri_name,bungi,road_name,building_num,latitude,longitude,zip_code, road_address,jibun_address, phone_num,website,business_entity,weekday_operating_hours,weekend_operating_hours,spring_operating_hours, summer_operating_hours,fall_operating_hours,winter_operating_hours, amenities_electricity,amenities_hot_water,amenities_wifi,amenities_firewood_sales,amenities_hiking_trail, amenities_water_playground,amenities_playground,amenities_mart,amenities_restroom_num,amenities_shower_room_num, amenities_sink_num,amenities_fire_extinguisher_num, surrounding_facilities_fishing,surrounding_facilities_hiking_trail,surrounding_facilities_water_play_cool, surrounding_facilities_water_play_leisure,surrounding_facilities_water_play_gorge,surrounding_facilities_water_play_river, surrounding_facilities_water_play_pool,surrounding_facilities_youth_experience, surrounding_facilities_rural_experience,surrounding_facilities_children_playground, glamping_bed,glamping_tv,glamping_refrigerator,glamping_wireless_internet, glamping_internal_bathroom,glamping_airconditioner,glamping_heating_equipment,glamping_cooking_tools, facility_features,facility_introduction,last_update_date ) VALUES(#{facility_name}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{category3}, #{sido_name}, #{sigungu_name} ,#{eupmyeondong_name}, #{ri_name},#{bungi},#{road_name},#{building_num},#{latitude},#{longitude},#{zip_code},#{road_address},#{jibun_address}, #{phone_num},#{website},#{business_entity},#{weekday_operating_hours},#{weekend_operating_hours},#{spring_operating_hours}, #{summer_operating_hours},#{fall_operating_hours},#{winter_operating_hours}, #{amenities_electricity},#{amenities_hot_water},#{amenities_wifi},#{amenities_firewood_sales},#{amenities_hiking_trail}, #{amenities_water_playground},#{amenities_playground},#{amenities_mart},#{amenities_restroom_num},#{amenities_shower_room_num}, #{amenities_sink_num},#{amenities_fire_extinguisher_num}, #{surrounding_facilities_fishing},#{surrounding_facilities_hiking_trail},#{surrounding_facilities_water_play_cool}, #{surrounding_facilities_water_play_leisure},#{surrounding_facilities_water_play_gorge},#{surrounding_facilities_water_play_river}, #{surrounding_facilities_water_play_pool},#{surrounding_facilities_youth_experience}, #{surrounding_facilities_rural_experience},#{surrounding_facilities_children_playground}, #{glamping_bed},#{glamping_tv},#{glamping_refrigerator},#{glamping_wireless_internet}, #{glamping_internal_bathroom},#{glamping_airconditioner},#{glamping_heating_equipment},#{glamping_cooking_tools}, #{facility_features}, #{facility_introduction}, #{last_update_date} )
